{{Lang|'''Kinjiro'''|ja=金次郎|ja_rm=Kinjirou}} was an [[NPC]] in [[Inazuma]].

==Profile==
Kinjiro wrote one of the notes in [[Rather Aged Notes]] in [[Tatarasuna]]. He is presumably dead.
